snippet: Eddie Brill books comics for “Late Show With David Letterman.” He also does stand-up and teaches comedy workshops. Is there a conflict of interest?
abstract: Jason Zinoman Critic's Notebook on comedian Eddie Brill who, in addition to performing stand-up and teaching comedy workshops, is in charge of booking comics for the Late Show With David Letterman.
lead_paragraph: Eddie Brill books comics for “Late Show With David Letterman.” He also does stand-up and teaches comedy workshops. Is there a conflict of interest?

headline.seo: Eddie Brill and the Comics on David Letterman’s Show
headline.main: The Comedy Gatekeeper Who Makes Letterman Laugh
headline.print_headline: The Comedy Gatekeeper Who Makes Letterman Laugh
